description: Deletes an existing global network. You must first delete all global network objects (devices, links, and sites), deregister all transit gateways, and delete any core networks.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the global network.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the global network.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the global network was created.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the global network.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags for the global network.
